programme.desc: Liam, a fireman, and Amy, a quilting teacher, team up to make a Christmas quilt for Liam's sister.

programme.title: Be Mine
programme.desc: A woman finds romance as she prepares to take over her mother's garden store.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, an installation designer enters a festive contest with a local heir.

programme.title: A Father's Choice
programme.desc: An unforgettable story about the promise and the power of family.

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A surprise awaits a single mother when she becomes engaged to the son of Santa Claus.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: With Love, Your Sweetly Salted
programme.desc: Critic Alison goes undercover at a restaurant she slated, but ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A privileged woman falls for a soup kitchen owner after reading his 7-year-old daughter's letter to Santa.

programme.title: Pure Country 2: The Gift
programme.desc: Three angels bestow the gift of song to a young girl, who rises to fame and fortune as a country music star.

programme.title: The Maltese Holiday
programme.desc: Two single travelers travel to Malta in search of adventure, and find love along the way.

programme.title: Christmas Cupid's Arrow
programme.desc: Holly, a single college professor, signs up for an online dating service, but begins to grow suspicious when the guy's beautifully-written texts don't match his actions.

programme.title: Waking Up to Christmas
programme.desc: On the verge of a massive deadline, a workaholic must turn Christmas around in her small town.

programme.title: Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: Thomas Kinkade presents Christmas Lodge: a place where a heart-warming past and loving future meet for one remarkable group of people.

programme.title: Hometown Holiday
programme.desc: Krista is starting the New Year with a new business and a resolution to be much more selective with who she dates. When Krista meets Ryan Rourke, an entertainment lawyer from LA, the two really hit it off.

programme.title: The Wedding Rule
programme.desc: Gemma and Max, former childhood friends are bequeathed a restaurant but must pretend to be married.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny’s bar will close unless he pays $17K; customers rally to save it. Meanwhile, Jay’s hazing alarms.

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: American vlogger lands role in British 'Pride and Prejudice' film, faces challenge mastering the accent.

programme.title: Vote One For Love
programme.desc: Candace is unexpectedly tasked with helping her former high school rival win a mayoral race.

programme.title: The Bouquet
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters set aside their differences to help their mother save her floral business.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: When Ramone discovers he is about to be King, he takes lessons from royal expert Angelica.

programme.title: Falling For Christmas
programme.desc: While healing from an injury, a figure-skater meets a man who shows her there is more to life than competing.

programme.title: And God Said to Cain
programme.desc: A man takes his revenge on the family responsible for his wrongful sentence to ten years of hard labor.

programme.title: Snowbeast
programme.desc: A Colorado ski resort is besieged by a sub-human beast that commits brutal murders on the slopes.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Thelma \u0026 Louise
programme.desc: Docile housewife Thelma accompanies her friend Louise on a brief fishing trip. However, when Louise kills a man who attempts to rape Thelma, the two become fugitives of the law.

credits.actor: Susan Sarandon,Geena Davis,Harvey Keitel,Michael Madsen,Christopher McDonald,Brad Pitt,Stephen Tobolowsky,Timothy Carhart

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

credits.actor: Denzel Washington,John Goodman,Donald Sutherland,Embeth Davidtz,James Gandolfini,Elias Koteas,Gabriel Casseus,Michael J. Pagan,Robert Joy,Bill Clark

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

credits.actor: Bill Murray,Melissa McCarthy,Naomi Watts,Chris O'Dowd,Jaeden Lieberher,Terrence Howard,Kimberly Quinn,Donna Mitchell,Nate Corddry,Dario Barosso,Ann Dowd,Scott Adsit

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

credits.actor: Omar Sy,Izïa Higelin,Michael Gregorio,Benoît Allemane,Féodor Atkine,Joshua Ballard,Trevor Devall,Damien Boisseau

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

credits.actor: Michael Douglas,Diane Keaton,Sterling Jerins,Frances Sternhagen,Maurice Jones,Andy Karl,Austin Lysy,Annie Parisse,Scott Shepherd,Frankie Valli,Michael Terra,Sawyer Tanner Simpkins,Maxwell Simpkins,Luke Robertson,Meryl Williams,Rob Reiner

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

credits.actor: Bruce Willis,Rebecca Hall,Catherine Zeta-Jones,Vince Vaughn,Joshua Jackson,Laura Prepon,Frank Grillo,Wayne Pere,John Carroll Lynch,Corbin Bernsen

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

credits.actor: Bradley Cooper,Emma Stone,Rachel McAdams,Bill Murray,John Krasinski,Danny McBride,Alec Baldwin,Bill Camp,Dennis \"Bumpy\" Kanahele,Danielle Rose Russell,Jaeden Lieberher

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

credits.actor: Justin Long,Matthew Gray Gubler,Jesse McCartney,Amy Poehler,Anna Faris,Christina Applegate,Alan Tudyk,Michael P. Northey

programme.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
programme.desc: When Dick's employer goes bankrupt, he and his wife, Jane, go broke and look for ways to make ends meet. Eventually, they resort to crime and decide to rob a crooked CEO to get their money back.

"300: Rise of an Empire" pits Themistokles against the massive invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemesia, the vengeful commander of the Persi.
